comment: /**  * Set the streaming body callback for this message.  * @param body the streaming body callback  */
code: /**  * Set the streaming body callback for this message.  * @param body the streaming body callback  */ void setBody(Body body).

comment: /**  * Write this body to the given {@link OutputStream}.  * @param outputStream the output stream to write to  * @throws IOException in case of I/O errors  */
code: /**  * Write this body to the given {@link OutputStream}.  * @param outputStream the output stream to write to  * @throws IOException in case of I/O errors  */ void writeTo(OutputStream outputStream) throws IOException.
